channel.title: Client crashes
channel.description:
I get this error on webclient 4.0
Exception in thread "Thread-15" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 64992 at rs.config.ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:190) at rs.config.ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:240) at rs.client.drawInterface(client.java:6948) at rs.client.drawTabArea(client.java:1442) at rs.client.drawGameScreen(client.java:6707) at rs.client.processDrawing(client.java:7439) at rs.RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:103) at rs.client.run(client.java:3869) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

item.title: Client crashes
item.dc:creator: @brickwood brickwood
item.description:
@brickwood wrote:

strn00b:

If you read the error, it says its having a problem getting the sprite for the item id 64992.

[quote=“zyle1992, post:3, topic:388493”][quote author=brickwood link=topic=484314.msg3548555#msg3548555 date=1301348112]
I get this error on webclient 4.0

Exception in thread “Thread-15” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 64992
at rs.config.ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:190)
at rs.config.ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:240)
at rs.client.drawInterface(client.java:6948)
at rs.client.drawTabArea(client.java:1442)
at rs.client.drawGameScreen(client.java:6707)
at rs.client.processDrawing(client.java:7439)
at rs.RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:103)
at rs.client.run(client.java:3869)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[/quote]

I would have to say that either there is no item for 64992, or the ItemDef[] is too small.[/quote]

That’s the thing… I can’t find 64992 in any of the .java files for the server.
This error occurs when I press the equipment tab.

Read full topic
